above_button.comment: No need to translate the link.
above_button.value: This applies to all ASICS accounts including ASICS Runkeeper, ASICS Studio, and ASICS.com. To delete specific data please visit our privacy hub.

below_button.value: Here by accident? Go to ASICS.com

leadin_text1.value: The following user and the associated data will be deleted from our servers:

top_details.value: Enter your email address associated with your account below. You will receive a link to reset your password.

format_date.comment: Please format this date to match the localized standard (using '.', '/', '-', etc.). Keep the letters M, D, and Y as identifiers for month, day, and year.

alt_brand_family.comment: This is alt text on image for low vision / blind users
alt_brand_family.value: Logos of all Asics family brands: Asics Tiger, Onitsuka Tiger, Häglofs, Runkeeper, and Asics Studio

alt_facebook.comment: This is alt text on image for low vision / blind users

alt_google.comment: This is alt text on image for low vision / blind users

top_details.value: One simple way to move across the entire ASICS family.

asics_studio_header.value: One last thing before we get to sweating

error_account_without_password.comment: User who has signed up but needs to click reset password email.
error_account_without_password.value: You appear to have already created an account. Please check your email for a password reset link.

error_invalid_password.value: The password must have at least 8 characters.

error_login_required.value: Please sign in and you will be redirected to your original request.

error_wrong_account_type_fb.value: You created your account with Facebook. Please sign in with Facebook.

error_wrong_account_type_google.value: You created your account with Google. Please sign in with Google.

helptext_password_requirements.value: The password must have at least 8 characters.

top_details.value: Sign in with your OneASICS account to get started with Runkeeper

delete_confirm_final.value: All of your data from these accounts will be deleted. Please note that this may take up to two weeks—we appreciate your patience.

delete_confirm_leadin.value: You will lose access to the following services:

delete_confirm_services.comment: No need to translate this, brand stays the same
delete_confirm_services.value:
• ASICS
  • ASICS Tiger
  • Onitsuka Tiger
  • OneASICS
  • ASICS Studio
  • ASICS Runkeeper
  • Pace Your Race
  • Frontrunners

success.value: Your account has been deleted. You will now be redirected.

error_check_date.value: Please verify that you used your correct birthday.

error_ineligible_to_register.value: You are ineligible to register for OneASICS.

error_invalid_password.value: The password must have at least 8 characters.

newsletter_box.value: I would like to receive newsletters and information about products, services and events by email, tailored to my interests and preferences as described in the Privacy Policy.

top_details.value: Enter your information to help us tailor gear and services for you.
